entry.title: Questions for the interview to the position Python developer.
entry.summary: This article containes a lot of useful links to prepare in interview python developer. Click button "Continue reading" and enjoy :)
entry.content:
Monty Python Silly Job Interview

Links in English

  • (EN) TOP 20 PYTHON INTERVIEW QUESTIONS FOR IT PROFESSIONALS
  • https://github.com/1st/interview
  • https://github.com/sigmavirus24/python-interview-questions
  • https://www.toptal.com/python/interview-questions
  • https://www.codementor.io/sheena/essential-python-interview-questions-du107ozr6

Links in Russian

  • http://grishaev.me/interview/
  • https://zxmd.wordpress.com/2010/11/23/python_interview_questions/
  • (RU) The question on the position of a junior developer at Yandex
  • (RU) Another interesting topic on Yandex
  • (RU) The task of Yandex
  • (RU) Here is a small list. Also from Yandex
  • (RU) Questions from Yury Yurevich

Have a nice interview!)

entry.title: Improve your skill with games
entry.summary: Here you will find a lot of games to improuve your skill in programming with FUN :)
entry.content:
Sometimes you want to play games, but without wasting time doing it. So this article provides links to games, but related to programming.

CSS games

  • CSS diner
  • Flexbox Defense
  • Flexbox Foggy

Training sites

  • CheckiO - Python, javascript. Awesome site!
  • Code Wars - Where I practice. Here u can find other interesting solution.
  • Hacker Rank - Practice coding. Compete. Find jobs.
  • Coding Game - The game captivated me with its graphics
  • KataCoda
  • Stratus Ville
  • Code Abbey
  • Exercism
  • XSS game - Game about XSS made by Google.
  • Code eval
  • Git game
